title: Since Lux/Ezreal ship was sunk, who would Lux be romantically interested in?
body: Riot had Lux sink her own ship with Ezreal, so it begs the question as to what kind of person Lux would ideally fall in love with. Probably not one of the stuck-up nobles from Demacia who would turn on her the moment they learn she's a mage, I imagine.

replies.body:
It's not really sunk. It's just that currently the lore Riot is working on is foundations stuff, which means that a teenaged girl who has just started her secret magic missions for Demacia, she hasn't left the region, so she hasn't met Ezreal.

So it's not so much "canceled" as it is "To be decided"

> [{quoted}](name=The Wolf King,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YXE8rmX2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-30T17:31:13.879+0000)
>
> It's not really sunk. It's just that currently the lore Riot is working on is foundations stuff, which means that a teenaged girl who has just started her secret magic missions for Demacia, she hasn't left the region, so she hasn't met Ezreal.
> 
> So it's not so much "canceled" as it is "To be decided"

This is most likely correct. It's not that the ship is necessarily sunk, just that it's not been built yet (story timeline wise).

Feel free to keep it sunk, I don't think it adds to the characters. I think it was nice and made sense in the star guardian universe though

Character connections should be more organic than just pushing 2 characters together because that's how it was 6 years ago in old lore

I am not responding to your comment, only at the awesomeness of your screen name. 

But, about your comment, I hear you. IMO, it really has to be organic to the character and the story, otherwise it feels like we are forcing champion interaction for the sake of champion interaction.

it doesn't necessarily need to be romantic per say but i always think taliyah {{champion:163}} is the champion i want lux to meet the most, they're both teenage girls learning their innate magical abilities and their internal challenges have a lot differences and similarities because of their respective upbringings and cultures association with magic

Well its pretty easy to make them meet through a story though, right ? :3 I think star guardian universe proved that they are good for each other its just that in main universe they didnt have occasion to meet yet.
Yes but don't start now building Ez x Lux in order for it to feel organic just because. It would be the same level of forcing the two together.

(Hint hint)

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/4d/Leona_PoolPartySkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170621202656

_(Ezreal is more interested in dragon ladies anyway.)_
I don't see Shyvanna in that picture?

> [{quoted}](name=M00ndanc3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YXE8rmX2,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2018-03-30T20:10:14.694+0000)

It's the weird leg kiss meme. :pp
it seems that meme was right before I joined so I have no clue what your talking about
A pictire of ezreal kissing shyvanna leg became a huge meme for a while.
Wierd
http://i.imgur.com/m7myr8w.jpg
yeah that is super wierd.

Luxreal is literally the only character connection I actually cared about, ever since I found out Garen is literally the world’s worst big brother. Please, *please*, make sure it comes back. I normally don’t care about ships, but if Lux were real, she’d be my wife, and I will pout *so hard* in Riot’s general direction if it isn’t brought back into canon.

Honestly, Luxreal reminded me of Han and Leía, except where Han isn’t plagued by slightly douchebaggy tendencies. It was great.
Well, in the meantime, there's SG Lux  and Ezreal. They are a confirmed couple in that world (or at least starting to be one): https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/star-guardian-starfall/

> [{quoted}](name=The Wolf King,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YXE8rmX2,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-30T18:00:23.416+0000)
>
> Well, in the meantime, there's SG Lux  and Ezreal. They are a confirmed couple in that world (or at least starting to be one): https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/star-guardian-starfall/

I've seen a lot of Lux x Jinx, but nothing to a few for Ez x Lux on the SG line. Not kinda sure what to expect from this but it's hinted that she got his attention at least. It means what it means. ;p
Got his attention?  Shes literally the only reason he didbt go "fuck this shit im out" and go exploring the galaxy.

Yeah, that definitely made me hopeful. I personally see Ezreal as a bit of a softie, the kind of person that would try to make you feel confident about yourself, which that part of the story communicated quite well.

This. The only ship i support in lol. I'm not even kidding i ship them so hard because they're perfect for each other. And as a lux main, this is the only connection that i can relate to in lol specially they're both teenagers in love in the old lore and will be explored soon. Just like me lol but as ez. I hope this relationship will blossom soon. I'm not even against LGBTQ relationships in LOL but for me Lux and Ez are not suitable for that relationship. I'm fine with those taricXez and jynxXlux shippers but lux and ez relationship is the best and even in the lore. Memes should be out of this. Maybe lux will eventually fall in love with ez and his unrequited love will blossom. But who am I to say, riot has the final laugh about this.

Downvote me if you want but this is my honest opinion about it. Specially they're a love team in the old lore. And I wish that would be retcon aswell as you want to retcon your fav champs old lore to the new one.
I have an entire fan fiction of them meeting while shes on a mission and he tries to stop her from completing it while having no idea what shes doing.  They fight.  Never actually talk.

Thanks for giving me hope. This is the only relationship that i ship in LOL and i hope it wont be sunk. And as a lux main, I hope to see many contents about her. Maybe a comic about her meeting ezreal would be great.
Garen duh
Pretty sure Riot has an absolute "NO INCEST" policy.

Oh i forgot Garen and Lux where bro and sis oops.....LOL well Lux and J4 then?

Shyvana and Quinn first there mate.

Plus Lux is *waaaaay* younger then him
Quinn is with darius you cant make me think otherwise.
Yeah, if by with, you mean stalking him and trying to end his life.

https://pre00.deviantart.net/b85b/th/pre/f/2014/184/2/b/darius_and_quinn_by_yosukii-d7p1nsd.jpg

Theyre allies in the woad universe.  Geeeeet rekt.
Stop hiding behind a fake name Rolo! I know it's you! /s
I honestly do not know who you're talking about.
Just a joke about Rolo's Art. A fan artist who's famous for supporting the DariusXQuinn ship

Ah, well I literally only ship them because of the above picture.  It was just so adorable. XD

I also ship Talon and Riven because of a picture of them both looking embareased in stripper outfits.

I then designed a battle bunny Talon Skin.
Okay, I’m confused: *how is Quinn x Jarvan a thing?* Like, seriously, Quinn spends the vast majority of her time on her own, killing Noxian scu-SPIES.

> [{quoted}](name=Dokueki Kenshin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YXE8rmX2,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2018-03-30T19:56:07.642+0000)
>

Her expedition and journal notes, go check it, and her voiceline about Jarvan hint that Valor said some embarrassing stuff. ;p

one of her joke lines:

> Valor: *squawk!*
Quinn: Who's there?
Valor: *Squawk!*
Quinn: Jarvan who?
Valor: *squawk!*
Quinn: Uh, Valor!

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Quinn

you can tell by the tone of her voice that she's kinda embarrassed by what he said (and like the good kind of embarrassed, like when someone asks if you have feelings for someone)

Personally, I thought it was made kinda clear that Lux didn't share the idea of being shipped with Ezreal through her interaction. It's somehow funny and stuff but I never liked the ship and I was like "Oh so, it made no sense in fact ? Well, it's ok"

I think it's kinda weird to necessarily ship characters for the sake of it, even more when it makes no sense and that the character are kinda young. Like Taliyah, Ekko or Zoe for instance. It can be funny and it's not really a problem in fact. Just that it needs some build up.
I didn't say that I'm not into ships. Like, Quinn/Shyvana x J4 is pretty good yeah (Shyvana x Jarvan is actually really cute, potentially a beautiful thing to develop )

Playtime's over. Let's be honest guys. Ezreal x Taric is the best LoL ship. {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

Ezreal and Lux are both 17-19 years old.

Taliyah and Ekko 15-17

Zoe is like 12 mentally but actually millenia old.

And Lux didnt say she didnt like Ezreal merely that they had never met in lore.  Ezreal does canonically still crush on her though in a more shes a famous individual kinda way.

Ez is into Lux in canon ? 

I get the age stuff. It's just not my jam. It's a go to most of the time on anything. I think it's boring in a certain manner unless it is somehow cute or it's really fitting.
Be careful with millenia old with small teen girls, you must know where this is going. {{summoner:11}}

Yeah Zoes voice lines show that Ezreal does still have a onesided crush on lux, theyve just never met and Lux is completely unaware of it.

And yeah no pervy the cosmic loli.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YXE8rmX2,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-30T19:01:18.247+0000)
>

Actually Zoe has no idea of how it works and it's a running gag. It could emphasize on the fact that she's making so much of a thing about it that it actually makes no sense and that maybe Ez doesn't even care about it. It would be in fact really fun to make Ezreal not into it and that he acts like he needs a break from cute girls if he had a voicelines update. x)

Whoa, hang on a sec, we have more canon ages for champs now?  Is there a link for that?

I know with the old timeline Lux was probably late 20s, but the old timeline was all sorts of weird.  19-20 does seem to fit her more visually, same with Ezreal.  

I'm excited if we have more timeline/canon age stuff, it helps to establish a more consistent universe.  (Although I will very much miss the Improbably Young Looking 60 Something Xin Zhao)

No we don't really have a timeline.

We get info like this from Rioters and their comments.

Lux was originally 14-17 in game, and early 20's in lore, but that was later changed to her current age of 17-19, which is from a comment stated during Elementalist Lux's hype stage.

Specifically they said that Elementalist Lux is mid twenties compared to normal Lux's 17-19.  
Going off this we also know that Ezreal is only a couple months older than her giving him the same age range.  
Taliyah was stated to be a couple years younger than Lux, the same age range as Ekko.
A couple is generally 2, so 15-17.

Zoe was outright stated to have been 12 when she got her powers.

And Jinx is a wider range, she's anywhere from 17-21, but she is older than Ekko, Vi is in the same age range as they grew up together.  And Vi and Cait are similar ages.

Similarly Garen and Lux grew up together and were only a few years apart, putting him in his early twenties, and Kat is the same general age.  Cass and Talon are her younger siblings, putting Talon (the youngest of the 3) from late teens to early twenties and Cass early twenties but less than Kat.

It's actually kinda cool to fit champs together like this.  :b

Of course not all champs have as many things to tie down their ages, which kind of sucks.

We do know that Kayn is probably early twenties, but he has no familial relationships to use that info on.

Oh and if you're doubting Lux having been 14-17 visually 
Remember she looked like this:
http://i.imgur.com/r0t2Ujb.jpg

Whoah there. 
Talon is most likely to be at least 20. No less. (Adopted in the Du Couteau family)
Garen and Kata are more likely to be mid-20 or slightly older. 
Cait and Vi would be early 20 aswell yeah.
I'd say Lux is more likely to be 19 than 17, or even early 20. Ez would be early 20, it's more fitting. 

And thanks, I really tried so hard to forget this splashart... :pp

Vi could be as young as 18 actually.

Lux is between 17 and 19 so shes probably 18 with Ez either 18 or 19.  He isn't 20 he's still a teenager.  And Talon is minimum 19, max 23.
Cass could be as old as 24, with Kat at 25 max, early twenties.

She is not older than that.

And while Talon was adopted he is still the youngest of the three.
Kat might even be older than Garen, but neither exceed 25.

Why's that ? It's not some anime stuff. They actually look older than what it seems. I don't like the teeny stuff and thing. I'd like to recognize Lux or Ez as actual adults.
Vi is better as an early 20. It emphasizes her looks and that she has grown up from her past delinquent teen stuff. 
I can't see Talon under 20. Have you seen the dude ? He passed his teen days. x)

Like i said Talon's youngest age is 19, he maxes out at 22-23.

His actual appearances in splash art, support this, take Dragonblade Talon for instance.
http://media.wwg.com/2017/01/talon-3-200611.jpg
If you think he looks older, remember he lives in a medieval society, and did not have the best upbringing. 

If you want to see Lux and Ezreal as adults you can.  But lore denotes her as younger than him and him as a teenager.  Of course the reason the have the 17-19 age _range_ is because their exact age is up to interpretation.

If you wanna see Vi as early twenties go right on ahead.

I assume you simply take them at their upper age ranges then.
